item.title: A Forecast a day keeps the Doctor away - Predicting Influenza Rates
item.description: The aim of the project is to predict disease rates, more precisely influenza-like illnesses rates (ILI rates). On the one hand historical time series data were used, on the other hand the data basis was extended by Google Trends data.
